AddressJson.description: The address of a customer, a building or a site

ApartmentJson.description: An apartment inside a building according to WoFIV

BuildingJson.description: A building as part of a property

size.description: Number of chat sessions in the list

CountryItemJson.description: A country item of a list

InboxMessage.description: Represents an enriched issue event stored in a user's inbox

id.description: Unique identifier of this inbox message

eventType.description: Event type, e.g. ISSUE_CREATED, ISSUE_UPDATED, ISSUE_ASSIGNED

link.description: Link to the frontend issue page

read.description: Whether the message has been read

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the notification was created

actorEmail.description: Email of the actor who triggered the event

ownerEmail.description: Email of the owner assigned to the issue

IssueItemJson.description: An issue item with basic information

first.description: Index of the first element in list of total available entries, starting at 1

OrganizationEmployeeJson.description: Employee information in context of an organization

ProjectItemJson.description: A project item with the user's member role only

id.description: Unique identifier of the project (generated by server)

members.description: Project members (managed separately via members endpoint)

first.description: Index of the first element in projects list of total available entries, starting at 1

size.description: Number of elements in projects list

ProjectMemberJson.description: Project member information in context of a project

id.description: Unique identifier of the project member (generated by server)

name.description: Full name of the project member (retrieved from user profile)

active.description: Active status of the project member (managed by server)

ProjectOrganizationListJson.description: List of organizations assigned to a project

RentJson.description: Rent information for a rentable unit

RentalAgreementJson.description: A rental agreement for rentable units

RentalAgreementListJson.description: A list of rental agreements for a project

RentalUnitNodeDataJson.description: Encapsulated data of a project tree node

tenant.description: Name of the tenant associated with this node

RentalUnitTreeNodeJson.description: A tree node representing a project entity

SiteJson.description: A site as part of a property

StorageJson.description: A storage inside a building but with living space according to WoFIV

TenancyItemJson.description: A rental agreement item with basic information from a tenant's perspective

location.description: Location of the node (address or custom)

TenancyJson.description: A read-only rental agreement of a rentable unit from a tenant's perspective

TenancyListJson.description: A list of rental agreements from a tenant's perspective

TenantJson.description: Tenant information in a rental agreement
